traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the assassin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two Poison Blade attacks.

actions.name: Poison Blade
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10 damage) poison damage.

legendary.name: Cunning
entries: The assassin escapes nonmagical restraints and ends the {@condition grappled} condition on itself, then moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Stab (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The assassin makes one Poison Blade attack.

legendary.name: Vanishing Escape (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The assassin creates a sudden distraction, such as a cloud of disorienting smoke or flash of dazzling light, filling a 10-foot cube within 5 feet of the assassin. Each creature of the assassin's choice in that area takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage, and the assassin has the {@condition invisible} condition. This invisibility lasts until the end of the assassin's next turn.
